page.title: 01AROUND RIEVAULX
page.content: Very mixed farming; peas, wheat, barley, livestock. Young farmers are raising Â£950 for sterilising machine for mealth centre with a variety of events. A Freisian won best breed and best of show at Edinburgh Royal show. Beed cattle supreme champoinship ay Birmingham Fatstock Show. A lot of hay was wasted, cereals a bit down, some good potato crops. some local villages up in arms about low R.A.F. flying. A wild mink was caught in the deer park. No clearfelling this year on Forestry Commission land this block.On Cleveland Way here 2 new gates done and 40 steps constructed at Blackdale Gill. The methodists at Rievaulx quite lively. At Rievaulx Terrace some felling of dead elms, restauration of Tuscan Temple and ceiling of Ionic Temple underway, bad weather caused cancellation of concert. On July 1st
